Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|いち}}

# [[one]], [[1]]
# ''term relating to the number one'':
## [[first]] in [[order]], [[foremost]]
## the [[beginning]]
## the [[best]]
## a kind of; one of something
## {{lb|ja|card games|sort=いち}} [[ace]]
# [[unity]]
# the [[bottom]] [[string]] of a [[shamisen]] or other Japanese musical instrument
